nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.accounts

Interface CurrencyService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Service
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CurrencyServiceLocal
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CurrencyServiceImpl, CurrencyServiceSecurity

    public interface CurrencyService
extends Service
    Service interface for currencies used to manage various currencies in the system.
    Author:
    luis

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Currency> listAll()
      Lists all currencies
      java.util.List<Currency> listByMember(Member member)
      Lists the currencies accessible to the given member
      java.util.List<Currency> listByMemberGroup(MemberGroup group)
      Lists currencies of account types associated with the given group
      java.util.List<Currency> listDRatedCurrencies()
      Lists currencies having D-rate Enabled.
      Currency load(java.lang.Long id)
      Loads a currency by id
      Currency loadBySymbolOrId(java.lang.String symbolOrId)
      Loads a currency by symbol or identifier
      int remove(java.lang.Long... ids)
      Removes the specified currencies

      Saves the currency
      void validate(Currency currency, WhatRate whatRate)
      Validate the specified currency
